review: The software is too limiting. It locks you into an experience that just isn't ideal for any but the most basic functions. The firmware, software, app store, etc. are all tightly controlled to ensure you remain within someone else's idea of a good experience. If you don't mind paying for a powerful computing device that has been intentionally crippled then it's not all that bad. I just prefer to create and customize my entertainment experience with complete access to the computing power I pay for.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Complete garbage, I'm on my second box and have had nothing but problems with both of them. Constantly says it has no internet connection even though it's hard wired directly to my uverse router/modem. Internet tech has been out and says my internet is just fine and has no problems. I also have no issues at all with any other device I use with my internet service. $99 I wish I never spent. Would not recomend this product to anyone.
